content.text:
# Draft:Republican Nigeria

Republican Nigeria is a Nigerian digital news platform that publishes national and international news. The outlet was founded by Nigerian journalist Adejayan Gbenga, professionally known as Gsong, who also serves as its publisher. It operates through its official website, [https://republican.com.ng republican.com.ng].
References
1. Republican Nigeria returns to full operations, reaffirms commitment to ethical journalism. Blueprint. July 2025. https://blueprint.ng/republican-nigeria-returns-to-full-operations-reaffirms-commitment-to-ethical-journalism/
2. Republican Nigeria resumes operations, reaffirms commitment to ethical journalism. Prompt News Online. July 2025. https://promptnewsonline.com/republican-nigeria-resumes-operations-reaffirms-commitment-to-ethical-journalism/
3. Republican Nigeria resumes operations, reaffirms commitment to ethical journalism. Core News. July 2025. https://corenews.ng/news/republican-nigeria-resumes-operations-reaffirms-commitment-to-ethical-journalism/
